Class Refined_storage

java.lang.Object
Refined_storage
public class Refined_storage
extends java.lang.Object
This class has the logged user, the database in use, with some login type functions
Author:
Refined Storage developers

    Refined_storage()

      public Employee get_employee()

    • get_admin

      public Admin get_admin()
      This method is used to get the admin in use
      Returns:
      the admin in use

    • set_admin

      public void set_admin​(int id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String pass, int prio)
      This method is used to set the admin that is being used
      Parameters:
      id - the id that is to be used
      name - the name that is to be used
      pass - the password that is to be used
      prio - the role that is to be used

    • set_user_logged

      public void set_user_logged​(java.lang.Boolean state)
      This method is used to set the user(admin, employee) logged in
      Parameters:
      state - true if the user is going to be used, false if not

    • get_user_logged

      public boolean get_user_logged()
      This method is to see if the user is being used or not
      Returns:
      true if it is being used, false if not

    • set_user_prio

      public void set_user_prio​(int p)
      This method is used to set the role of the user in use
      Parameters:
      p - the role to be set(1 for admin, 2 for employee)

    • get_user_prio

      public int get_user_prio()
      This method is used to get the role of the user that is being used
      Returns:
      the role of the user being used (1 admin, 2 employee)

    • get_Db

      public DbFunctions get_Db()
      This method is used to get the database in use
      Returns:
      the database

    • perform_a_login

      public boolean perform_a_login​(int user_id, java.lang.String password)
      This method is used to perform the login. The parameters user_id and password are going to be compared to those in the database
      Parameters:
      user_id - the user id
      password - the user password
      Returns:
      true if the login was succesfull, false if not

    • perform_a_logout

      public void perform_a_logout()
      This method is used to perform the logout
